title: [Security] Path traversal via path parameter - no validation against '../' sequences
fix_summary: Added path validation to TodoStorage.__init__() to detect and reject path traversal attacks via '../' and '..\' sequences
security_improvements: Blocks '../' path traversal sequences in user input
Allows legitimate relative and absolute paths for normal use
limitations: Absolute paths are still allowed (could be used for arbitrary file access, but this is a design decision to support testing and legitimate use cases)
